page.title: 13Homelife in the Twyford Area
page.content: {Homes:}Everyone enjoys a good standard of living and homes are well furnished and comfortable.Almost all have central-heating fueled by oil,electricity,bottled gas,coal or,as in many rural areas,wood.There is no gas in the area. Labour- saving gadgets such as cleaners, washing machines,food processors, and mixers are used in every home. Most have a freezer. {Family:}Families become more and more scattered as work or marriage takes children away from the family home. Very few marry a partner from the same area.Most housewives have a part-time or full-time job outside the home once children are at school.Husbands now are very much involved in the home. {Meals:}Families usually have breakfast and the evening meal together.Lunch is a snack.Sunday is for leisure together
